channel.title: Anyone know how to add objects? ~will pay~
channel.description:
Q1:
FOR INSTANCE SAY I WANTED TO ADD A BANK BOOTH INSIDE THE SHOP HOW WOULD I GO ABOUT DOING SO?
Q2:
HOW WOULD I GO ABOUT CREATING A CUSTOM CHARACTER, OR CHANGING THE NAME OF ONE EG. RE-NAME BANKER TO GAY TWAT.
I WILL PAY IF ANYONE CAN HELP ME, LETS SAY [b][i]50K[/i][/b] ?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 08, 2006, 09:30:44 AM[/size][hr]C'MON EVEN A LINK TO A THREAD, I'LL PAY 100K SOMEONE? ANSWER ANY MY QUESTIONS OR TELL ME IF IT'S POSSIBLE

item.title: Anyone know how to add objects? ~will pay~
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

go to ur client java and hold ctrl+f
find public void NewObjects() {
u will see ::
makeGlobalObject(2510, 3863, 2783, -3, 10);// Anvil
the first two numbers 2510, 3863 is the coords
2783 is the object id
-3 is the direct u want it to face
10 u just leave it there
-3 to 0 are directions u want it to face

Read full topic
